indian.details: Transit Visa required to leave airport. Airside transit allowed.

activities.title: Izumi Tenku no Yu Onsen
activities.description: Luxury hot spring with Mt Fuji views connected to T3 (Airport Garden).

activities.title: Edo Koji Street
activities.description: Traditional wooden Edo-style street inside the terminal with souvenir shops.

activities.title: Sushi at Tsurutontan
activities.description: Famous Udon and Sushi restaurant in Terminal 3. Huge bowls.

activities.title: Shibuya Crossing
activities.description: World's busiest crossing. 40 mins by train from airport (Keikyu Line).

activities.title: TeamLab Planets
activities.description: Immersive digital art museum. Requires booking. Taxi recommended.

activities.title: Tokyo Ramen Street
activities.description: 8 famous ramen shops in Tokyo Station underground.

activities.title: TIAT Shower Rooms
activities.description: Clean shower cubicles in T3 Arrivals. Great for freshening up.

activities.title: Don Quijote (Donki) Haneda
activities.description: Discount store for snacks, KitKats, and souvenirs. Located in Airport Garden.
